answerText: The Leopard [or Il Gattopardo][10] Giuseppe Tomasi di Lampedusa, the author of The Leopard is an author from this country, which is also the home of the playwright Luigi Pirandello.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 8 | 4 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of this work practices astronomy with Father Pirrone and is upset to hear that Calogero is almost as rich as his own family. [10] Name this novel about Prince Fabrizio Salina. It begins just as Garibaldi's Expedition of the Thousand is occurring.
